name: Raspberry Pi OS (Bookworm)
install_guide_markdown:
# Raspberry Pi OS Installation Guide

## Prerequisites
- Raspberry Pi 4 or 5 recommended
- microSD card (32GB+)
- USB card reader
- Raspberry Pi Imager software
- Power supply (USB-C)

## Step 1: Download Raspberry Pi Imager
Get the official imager from raspberrypi.com/software

## Step 2: Insert microSD Card
Insert into USB reader connected to computer

## Step 3: Open Imager
Select Raspberry Pi device, choose OS (Lite or Desktop), and select storage

## Step 4: Write Image
Click Write and wait for completion (5-10 minutes)

## Step 5: Boot Pi
Insert card into Pi, power on, and follow initial setup

install_steps.title: Download Raspberry Pi Imager
install_steps.detail_md: Visit https://raspberrypi.com/software and download the official Raspberry Pi Imager for your OS (Windows, macOS, or Linux).

install_steps.title: Prepare microSD Card
install_steps.detail_md: Insert a 32GB or larger microSD card into a USB reader connected to your computer.

install_steps.title: Write OS Image
install_steps.detail_md: Open Imager, select Raspberry Pi device, choose OS version (Lite for headless, Desktop for GUI), and write to card.

install_steps.title: Boot Raspberry Pi
install_steps.detail_md: Insert microSD card into Pi, connect power, and wait for first boot (may take 2-3 minutes on first startup).
